title: [Bug Report] New client glitches
body: Sometimes I will get a glitch in the new client where I won't be able to use any of my hextech loot or when I left click my friends, there's no additional options. Only way I have managed to solve this is to quit the client and reload it, this is obviously annoying and something I'm disappointed about in the new client. I haven't seen anyone address this issue so forgive me if this has already been reported.
